Detailed Description

Member Function Documentation

SearchMatch* SearchMatchReplyPacket::getFirstMatch (  int &  position,
int &  nbrMatches
)  const
 

Reads the header and returns the first object (if any, otherwise NULL).

Parameters:
position The value of position is set to point after the first object. This is an out parameter (invalue is ignored).
nbrMatches The number of matches in the packet (value parameter).
Returns:
The first match of the packet (or NULL). You should delete this object when you are done with it. After deleting all objects associated with a certain packet, the packet can be deleted. (the objects refer to strings in the packet directly).

SearchMatch* SearchMatchReplyPacket::getNextMatch (  int &  position  )  const
 

Implement all subclasses here.

Returns:
the next object of the packet (or NULL if packet end)
